name: The Black Cat and the Monster King
name_original: The Black Cat and the Monster King
description:
The Black Cat and the Monster King is a 2D Platforming Adventure, which sees your soul get resurrected by the luck of a black cat after he walks across your grave. 

Use your Whip and nine lives to take revenge on the Monster King and his minions that killed you and your wife a year earlier. 

Will you be able to get revenge or will you fall victim to the Monster King's wrath once again...find out in The Black Cat and the Monster King!
